level.heading: VENDING LOCATIONS[COLON] STATIONARY ROADWAY VENDING LOCATIONS[COLON] GENERAL (ยง4-530)

level.text: A Stationary Roadway Vendor must vend from a fixed location with a valid Vending Site Permit in an assigned Roadway Vending Location as designated in ยง 531;
A Stationary Roadway Vendor may not vend in any roadway location other than the authorized Roadway Vending Location for which the Stationary Roadway Vendor holds a valid Vending Site Permit.
